scripts.build: cargo build && npm run generate-ts && npm run build-ts
scripts.generate-ts: cargo test --release 2>/dev/null || cargo test --release -- --nocapture && npm run copy-bindings
scripts.copy-bindings: mkdir -p bindings && find . -name '*.ts' -path '*/target/*' -exec cp {} bindings/ \; 2>/dev/null || find . -name '*.ts' -exec cp {} bindings/ \; 2>/dev/null || echo 'No .ts files found'
scripts.clean: cargo clean && rm -rf dist/ bindings/ node_modules/
